name: Motor Moon
description:
Motor Moon is a four-player lunar rover racing game where to survive you'll need speed to thrive! One camera follows the leader, four players compete to be ahead. If you fall too far behind, you lose the round and respawn. 

Motor Moon was made for the 2019 Indie Galactic Space Jam held by Space Florida, NASA, SpaceX, and Indienomicon. Its focus is wide range accessibility and play-ability: a custom game pad was made without a joy stick for players who don't have fine motor control skills, a separate version for Planetarium screens was made in homage to our hosts the Orlando Science Center. Any planetarium can play a separate version of the game without warping.
